programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Are you prepared for life’s imminent health obstacles? Learn to manage infertility, how to respond when someone faints and discover the silent killer that takes more lives than breast cancer and AIDS combined.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Think a sore throat just means a cold or flu? It could be something much worse — find out! And what you SHOULD and SHOULDN’T’ be taking your pills with. Are you choosing correctly? Plus, banish back fat with an instant fix that’s sure to surprise you!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.sub-title: Woman Amputates Leg to Save Baby
programme.desc: Inspiring story of a mom who decided to amputate her leg after a motorcycle crash to save her unborn baby. #DropTheSugar Dollar Store challenge proves you can eat healthy on a budget! Hundreds of women getting scammed with pregnancy congratulations cards? CBD vending machines coming to a convenience store near you!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Live fast, die young, party all night – rock and roll’s infamous lifestyle is in the spotlight. Learn how to stay safe while you have fun! Plus, the daughter of shock rocker Alice Cooper shares stories from life on the road.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Whether it’s a tick, a cyst, phlegm or dirt, or if you’ve got something stuck in your eye or ear, get tips to get it out! Plus, are you ready to give birth? Get the safest ways to speed up labor and delivery.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Embarrassed by excessive sweating? Bothered by bugs on your body? Grossed out by growths? The Doctors gives you solutions for your unpleasant body problems. And, get the 411 on natural cleaning products.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: t’s the plastic surgery show! Heidi Montag reveals her latest plastic surgery procedures and her regrets! GG from Shahs of Sunset dishes on her plastic surgery obsession and reality star Tiffany Pollard shares how cosmetic surgery completely changed her life. Plus, see how the Kardashian’s doctor boosts the booty without a scalpel in just 30 minutes! Go inside the OR to see the surgeries to give you sexy bedroom eyes, a perfect pout, and the ideal hourglass figure!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Ask The Doctors: can sex help menopause! Dr. Batra’s fix for greasy hair. Is it safe to dye a young child’s hair? Safe ways to break up dog fights. Is it safe to smoke pot while dealing with depression? Dr. Travis’ favorite exercises to prevent slouching. The Bachelor's Dr. Chris Strandburg reveals his top 3 tips to stop teeth grinding! Can sleep apps actually diagnose sleep apnea?

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: In a THE DOCTORS exclusive, the family of 1st Lieutenant Katie Blanchard, the army nurse who was brutally set on fire by a coworker, sits down with our hosts to reveal details on the day that changed them forever. Then, cops conduct a cavity search, down there … over pot? The dash cam video that has one attorney calling “rape by cop.” And, a 4-year-old duct-taped to a chair … at day care? And, the Japanese therapy trend that has patients “return to the womb”? Plus, could breast milk be best … for bug bites?

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Whether you’re suffering from serious issues or contemplating cosmetic surgery, The Doctors help you decide if you should go under the knife. Plus, actress Jessica Alba reveals her secrets for staying in shape.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: In a The Doctors exclusive, Teen Mom OG stars Catelynn and Tyler Baltierra open up about Catelynn’s treatment for postpartum depression and the recent tabloid divorce rumors! Plus, he went from bullied to buff, and now one of your favorite guests returns to show off his skin removal! See the surgery closer than ever… from a Go-Pro camera on the surgeon’s head! And, one teen’s amazing transformation after a surgery to straighten the 180-degree angle in his head and neck!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Is allowing your child to play youth football the same as child abuse? Famed neuropathologist played by Will Smith in the film Concussion and a former NFL player join the controversial debate on America’s pastime! Plus, should your children be learning about gender identity … in kindergarten? Then, doctors are removing gastric bands now more than ever! One woman shares her weight loss surgery nightmare! Plus, how does weed affect your heart? One mom claims her son’s marijuana use caused his death. And, America is having a “Constipation Crisis!” We have solutions to get your poop back on track!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.sub-title: Why Do I Itch and Smell Like That?
programme.desc: Get the lowdown on bug, mosquito and spider bites, tickles in the back of your throat and more! And, why bad breath may indicate a more serious problem. Plus, see the latest at-home technology to relieve itchy skin.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Fainting, falling, flu, fibroids and fat … F-words can pack a punch. Fret not! See a new solution for uterine fibroids and get the facts about fainting. And, reduce the risk of falls with Tai Chi exercises!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: A female fan reaches out to THE DOCTORS about her addiction to exercise leading to an extreme health intervention! Then, a 64-year-old woman gives birth to twins after IVF, but should she have been able to have the babies after a previous child was taken away from her? Plus, actress Marcia Gay Harden reveals a health crisis affecting her family! And, it’s the shocking viral video you have to see to believe – sex on the freeway on the back of a motorcycle?

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Backaches, allergies and toothaches are among the most common recurring health problems. Find out how to keep your chronic medical issues from coming back, and learn to keep body odor and bad breath at bay.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Think you know what’s to blame for what’s ailing you? Bad skin? Must be the chocolate. Acid Reflux? Probably spicy food? Not so fast – The Doctors shed new light on common problems. Plus, how to get your body back after baby!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: You won’t believe what happens when the show’s cameras go “Inside The O.R.” as a 51-year-old woman has a large fibroid removed, which left her looking 5 months pregnant! Controversial new study claims smart women should marry down if They want to start a family. E-cigarettes and vaping have been sold as a way for smokers to quit – new research on why it doesn’t work? The Doctors’ Court: woman arrested with five different types of drugs hidden…in her vagina?

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.sub-title: Top 5 Questions To Ask Your Doctor
programme.desc: Learn how to interview potential doctors, which tests you need and how to make the most of your next doctor’s visit. Plus, when you need to go to the emergency room – STAT.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Staying in shape isn’t only about muscle tone. From your lungs to your knees, improve your body from the inside out! Plus, flatten your tummy without surgery, and Alicia Silverstone’s secrets for healthy and sweet treats!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Considering plastic surgery of any kind? Don't miss Krissy's story and Dr. Ordon's essential do's and don'ts to keep you safe. Watch several controversial potty training techniques in action and see if any of them are right for your child.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Look and feel young at any age! Hollywood film stars Diahann Carroll, Dyan Cannon and Jacqueline Bisset reveal the secrets of Their eternal youth. And, see a new non-invasive skin smoothing treatment. Plus, an instant booty lifting procedure.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: From kitchen catastrophes to workplace disasters, don’t miss the list of everyday health hazards that may surprise you. Learn when you can do it yourself and when you should call a professional.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.sub-title: Leave it On or Take it Off
programme.desc: Is it razor burn, pimples or something worse? Learn the difference between bumps down there. Plus, four tips for a smooth, sexy bikini line. Then, slash hundreds of calories with a simple breakfast swap. And, Dr. Travis turns up the heat at a sweat lodge!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.sub-title: Improve Your Health From A to Z
programme.desc: Get simple solutions for hiccups, nosebleeds, vertigo and 23 other ailments with The Doctors ABCs of medicine! Plus, learn how to how to last longer in bed. And, the number one mistake parents make when their kids get sick.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: How far would you go for beauty? A controversial surgery alters feet so women can wear heels. And, an acupuncture facelift that claims to take years off a woman's appearance. And, the latest in laser surgery that erases tattoos.

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: The Doctors investigates lunchboxes! Could dangerous mold, fungus and bacteria be hiding in your child’s lunchbox? You may want to hit the brakes at the drive-thru … could cancer-causing chemicals be hiding in your fast food? An erotic website offers sex-ed for teens with a new “wellness” hub? A judge’s sentence is raising eyebrows: celibacy as punishment? Get your daily dose of gross with a viral earwax video! You might want to think twice before eating chicken with white stripes; find out why! And, how a penny could help you avoid sickness and save wads of cash in an emergency!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Comedian and television personality Howie Mandel confronts his OCD and germ phobia with THE DOCTORS! Our investigation reveals the filth on your hands and the most germ-infested places you’re touching! Restaurant horror stories you must see before you eat out again! Then, a mother’s excruciating jaw condition is destroying her life! Plus, a cure for garlic breath that’s right in your fridge!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: From fighting flab, to stifling sneezes to quieting a crying baby, The Doctors reveals easy fixes for your most common problems! And, Oscar-winning actress Marisa Tomei shares her top secrets to a better body!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.sub-title: The Secrets to Never Getting Sick
programme.desc: Runny noses, sore throats, nasty coughs, vomiting: stop dreaded symptoms before they start! The Doctors reveal the top secrets to never getting sick. Find out when you should - and shouldn't - medicate, natural remedies in your kitchen and more!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: Go LIVE in the O.R. and watch how surgeons perform a new valve replacement procedure! Are there hidden germs in your kitchen making you sick? The simple swaps to cut down on your sugar! Experts debate if it’s ever okay to yell at your kids!

programme.title: The Doctors
programme.desc: A mom is under fire for weighing her 6-year-old daughter every single day after she’s bullied for her weight! Is this mom doing the right thing the wrong way? Plus, the controversy over using marijuana for pain relief in the NFL continues! Do you think the drug should be allowed for players? Then, kids are so stressed out doing their homework they now need therapists? We discuss the new alarming trend! And, using oregano oil to stop a cold in its tracks – is it a buzz or a bust?
